type: 13D Contract - Bid Opportunity for Trap and Data Collection Services
procurement_category: 13D Service, Consulting, Engineering and Resource Providing
description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is conducting a competitive procurement process for the provision of trap and data collection services for the Cobourg Brook stream. The objective of the project is to operate the trap, conduct a mark-recapture study with the sea lamprey captured, and collect and supply raw data to be used to generate a population estimate in this stream.
tags: Service, Consulting, Engineering and Resource Providing
Service, Consulting, Engineering and Resource Providing
